events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving a rear-end collision on the highway, notifying the insurer to start the process.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to involvement of the insured vehicle in a collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the customer's accident claim swiftly and professionally.
The insurer sent an acknowledgment to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim.
The claims team requested detailed photos of the vehicle damage and a police report related to the collision.
Customer promptly submitted all requested documents including accident photos and official police report.
The investigation team initiated review of the claim, verifying damage and liability based on submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded confirming the other party was at fault in the rear-end auto accident.
A settlement offer was made to cover vehicle repairs and temporary replacement car expenses.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling and clarity of the settlement proposal.
The insurer officially approved the claim based on the findings and agreed settlement terms.
Payment was issued to the repair shop for vehicle damages as well as reimbursement for rental car costs.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after the payment was confirmed received by the customer.
All documents and records related to the collision claim have been archived for future reference.
